document_data.name: Alakbar bin Alad bin Alaq
document_data.mainbody: '''Alakbar bin Alad bin Alaq''', or '''Alakbar''' for short, was the only male heir of the Padishah of [[Medina al-Afyal]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Relationships: Alakbar was the firstborn son of [[Alad bin Alaq bin Alonka]], the Padishah of Medina al-Afyal. He was a member of the [[House of Alon]], the historical ruling family.
document_data.Activities: Alakbar left for a voyage over the [[Crowded Sea]] in [[1363 DR]] and was not seen since.
